name: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 3
name_original: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 3
description:
Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 3 is an educational puzzle game developed by IE Institute. It was originally released in 2013. Nintendo published the game.
You can play Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 3 on Nintendo 3DS.
